mapper.select: SELECT pay_seq "paySeq" , user_id "userId" , pay_date "payDate" , pay_item "payItem" , pay_type "payType" , pay_price "payPrice" FROM pay_his_if_tb ORDER BY pay_date
SELECT u.user_id "id" , d.username "user" , d.account_status "accountStatus" , d.default_tablespace "defaultTableSpace" FROM dba_users d, user_sch_tb u where d.username = u.user_sch_nm
